changes.text: Redesigned home screen layout for better usability
Improved search ticker screen UI and UX
Refreshed settings screen with a cleaner design
Updated ticker info screen visuals and layout
Introduced common title component across all screens
Added filter to display only equity tickers on the search screen
Corrected fair value price calculation logic
Added additional check for PB ratio to prevent invalid values
Introduced a bottom sheet to show more info about specific stats
Clicking on a watchlisted item now redirects to the stock info page
